about_the_game:
Nightway - is a cooperative psychological horror game where players must work together to survive and escape the woods. The objective is to gather resources and make your way to the train as quickly as possible, while avoiding terrifying and unknown entities that lurk in the darkness. The game challenges players to think critically and make strategic decisions as they navigate through the eerie and unsettling atmosphere of the woods.


Stranded in the middle of a dense forest, players must navigate the treacherous wilderness and gather resources to repair their broken train. With limited supplies and a looming threat of a deadly monster hunting them, players must work together to escape the forest before it's too late. Coal is a crucial resource needed to fuel the train and make their escape, but players must also be prepared to defend themselves against the unknown force that broke the last car. Can you survive the wilderness and outsmart the monster before it's too late?

Practically a blind monster


In Nightway, players must beware of a monstrous creature that has escaped from a train car. This monster is extremely dangerous and its sole purpose is to hunt down and kill the players. The unique aspect of this monster is its blindness, it can only detect the player's presence through sound. Players must be careful to not make noise and stay silent in order to avoid detection and death. The monster adds an intense and thrilling aspect to the game, as players must use stealth and strategy to evade the creature while trying to escape the woods.

Nightway features a variety of key elements that add depth and excitement to the game.


  • Players have the option to play alone against a bot, providing a solo experience for those who prefer to go it alone.
  • The ability to gather a team of friends up to 6 people and go on a scary adventure together, providing a social and cooperative aspect to the game.
  • Each player has unique perks that can be used to help the team reach the goal and survive together.
  • Voice chat feature allows players to communicate with one another in real-time.
  • Repair and maintenance of the train is an important aspect of the gameplay.
  • Players can control the train and make decisions about their route.
  • Players have the freedom to choose their direction of movement.
  • Gathering resources for survival is crucial to progress in the game.
  • Switching arrows of the railway tracks is an element that adds an extra layer of gameplay.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may not be appropriate for all ages as it contains violent or gory content.

short_description: Nightway is a multiplayer horror game designed for 1-6 players. In this game, one player is randomly selected to be the monster, a creature who is blind but can hear perfectly. The other players take on the role of survivors who must work together to avoid the monster and escape the forest by train.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
